Growing Up NYC
Patterns v1.0.0-14

List Box

Source: src/components/list-box/list-box

The List Box component provides a wrapper to display listed content or options.

Demonstration

  1. Baby0-11 months

    1. 0 months
    2. 4 months
    3. 6 months
    4. 9 months

  2. Toddler1-3 years

    1. 1 years
    2. 2 years
    3. 3 years
<ol class="c-list-box c-list-box--primary" data-multiselectable="true">
  <li class="c-list-box__item">
    <h3 class="c-list-box__heading bg-color-pink" id="ages-heading-baby"
      tabindex="0">Baby<span class="c-list-box__subheading">0-11 months</span>
    </h3>
    <ol class="js-accordion__content c-list-box__content bg-color-pink"
      id="ages-panel-baby">
      <li class="c-list-box__subitem"><a
          class="button--full-width button--primary text-color-pink" href="#">0
          months</a></li>
      <li class="c-list-box__subitem"><a
          class="button--full-width button--primary text-color-pink" href="#">4
          months</a></li>
      <li class="c-list-box__subitem"><a
          class="button--full-width button--primary text-color-pink" href="#">6
          months</a></li>
      <li class="c-list-box__subitem"><a
          class="button--full-width button--primary text-color-pink" href="#">9
          months</a></li>
    </ol>
  </li>
  <li class="c-list-box__item">
    <h3 class="c-list-box__heading bg-color-orange" id="ages-heading-toddler"
      tabindex="0">Toddler<span class="c-list-box__subheading">1-3 years</span>
    </h3>
    <ol class="c-list-box__content bg-color-orange" id="ages-panel-toddler">
      <li class="c-list-box__subitem"><a
          class="button--full-width button--primary text-color-orange"
          href="#">1 years</a></li>
      <li class="c-list-box__subitem"><a
          class="button--full-width button--primary text-color-orange"
          href="#">2 years</a></li>
      <li class="c-list-box__subitem"><a
          class="button--full-width button--primary text-color-orange"
          href="#">3 years</a></li>
    </ol>
  </li>
</ol>
